titles.title: To provide a 4 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton, PA-NJ-DE-MD Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Extends a four percent interim geographic pay adjustment (as provided under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990 to General Schedule (GS) employees in certain high cost-of-living areas) to GS employees in the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area in Pennsylvania, Delaware, Maryland, and New Jersey.
